rules_text:
Destroy target creature. 
You may have this spell deals 3 damage to each other creature if there are five or more lands in your realm. If you didn't, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. [i](Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The greater the tyrant, the greater the fall.[/i]
